alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Wright (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wright and north central Hamilton Counties through NOON CDT... At 1130 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Webster City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail and additional heavy rainfall of one to two inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Webster City around 1150 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
